Question
========

To compare two populations, a sample is drawn from both sample is drawn with the following results:______________. Group 1: n = 10, mean = 107, variance = 400. Group 2: n = 12, mean = 112, variance = 484. The value of the test size F to test the null hypothesis σ~1~^²^ = σ~2~^²^ is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.91
* 1.05
* 1.1
* 1.21

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.91: Incorrect
* 1.05: Incorrect
* 1.1: Incorrect
* 1.21: Correct
